main event: Six observers watched a shiny silver colored object moving slowly northward.
interesting points: The object emitted a noise similar to that of an aircraft,The sighting lasted for 15 to 20 minutes,The object was too high to be a helicopter,Three family members, including the witness's wife and two sons, confirmed the sighting,The report states that the witness attempted to take a photo but the object disappeared before he could return.
witness description: a 13-year-old boy with his wife and two sons
